data.title: Embassy of the Slovak Republic in Hanoi
data.text:
A software random date allocation system was established for the allocation of the application for the granting of a national visa type D in connection with the submission of the application for residence and the assignment of the dates for the submission of the application for residence at the Embassy of the Slovak Republic in Hanoi.

An appointment will be randomly selected two months in advance.

​​​​​​​The Embassy of the Slovak Republic in Hanoi will inform the public about the next date for the registration for the purpose of submitting applications for temporary residence and applications for national visas in connection with the submission of applications for residence.

The Embassy of the Slovak Republic in Hanoi informs the applicants that the applicant for registration is allowed to apply for a date allocation in one submission, either applies for registration for the submission of an application for D type visa or for registration to submit an application for the residence permit. It is not possible to register for both types of submissions at the same time.

It is important that applicants carefully state and check the correctness of data entered during registration (including spaces and typos), as the application will not be accepted if there are any discrepancies.​​​​​​​

The appointment of a visit to verify the signature or superlegalization of official documents of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam can be only booked online.

The service is available in two-month intervals in advance.

In the upcoming period, on 5th September, 2024, from 9:00 AM local time, the appointments reservation for the months of October and November 2024 will be opened.

Booking will be possible until the appointments are fully booked.
